message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 80% and you take 20%
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can have 70% and I'll take 30%
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting any younger. You can have 40% and I'll take 60%
I'm not giving up yet. I'll give you 45% and take 55%
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about a fair split. You can have 45% and I'll take 55%... but this is my last offer
